changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.technical_interval ( id int8 NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY( INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1 NO CYCLE), "name" varchar NULL, description varchar NULL, date_create timestamp(0) NULL, date_update timestamp(0) NULL, user_create int8 NULL, user_update int8 NULL, date_start timestamp(0) NULL, date_end timestamp(0) NULL, client_id int8 NULL, is_all_entity_client bool NOT NULL DEFAULT false, is_archive bool NULL, CONSTRAINT technical_interval_pk PRIMARY KEY (id) );
